title: Behind The Podcast With DJ Podgorny
itunes:title: Behind The Podcast With DJ Podgorny
description:
Let’s go behind the podcast and map out the foundation that makes a podcast successful long-term. Anyone can launch a podcast, but not everyone launches a successful show.
 
D.J. Podgorny is the founder of Audlio and host of the Behind the Podcast. D.J. has worked with top business podcasters like Andy Frisella, Nathan Latka, and Jordan Harbinger.
 
In this interview, we map out some key foundational pieces you need to launch a successful podcast, and more.
 
Show Notes: https://underdogempowerment.com/dj-podgorny/
 
Get More Involved: 
 
  1. Leave A Review & Subscribe On iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/underdog-empowerment/id1373572178
  2. Access Our Top Resource Recommendations: https://underdogempowerment.com/resources/
  3. Join The Elite Underdog Alphas With The Free Underdog Report: https://underdogempowerment.com/report
  4. Subscribe On YouTube: https://underdogempowerment.com/youtube
